headline: Jackson's Super Veggie Straws Officially Hit Shelves, a Category-Defining, Truly Unique Crunchy Snack
summary: The snack aisle just got a serious upgrade. Jackson's, America's fastest-growing snack brand known for its uncompromising use of avocado oil and real ingredients, is officially launching its highly anticipated Jackson's Super Veggie Straws ™, available now at SnackJacksons.com, Walgreens, and regional grocery stores including Hy-Vee, Sendik's, Woodman's, Weis, Market District and more with Amazon availability coming later this month.
